titles.title: Loser Pays Legal Fee Fairness Act
To ensure that when Federal law allows a court to award attorney fees to one party, the law must allow the court to award attorney fees to any party.

bill.summary: 7/28/2005--Introduced. Loser Pays Legal Fee Fairness Act - States that whenever federal law provides a basis on which a court may award attorney's fees to one prevailing party, the court may award such fees to any prevailing party on that basis, except where the law permits the award of such fees only to the United States.
